file.name: simple.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info: { version: 0.1.1, title: hi}
servers:
- url: 'https://localhost:8443/hello/v1'
#  description: dev
paths:
  /echo:
    get:
       summary: Just a method
       operationId: api.get_hello
       responses:
         '200':
           description:  Hi!
           content:
              api.ication/json:
                 schema: {}
    post:
      summary: Just a method
      operationId: api.post_hello
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          api.ication/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Text'
      responses:
        '200':
          description:  Hi!
          content:
            api.ication/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Text'

  /basic-auth:
    get:
       summary: Just a method
       security:
       - basic: []
       operationId: api.get_hello_auth
       responses:
         '200':
           description:  Hi!
           content:
              api.ication/json:
                 schema: {}
components:
  schemas:
    Text:
      required:
      - text
      properties:
        text:
          type: string
  securitySchemes:
    jwt:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      x-bearerInfoFunc: api.forward_token
    basic:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
      x-basicInfoFunc: api.basic_auth

Error: notImplemented: path "/basic-auth": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [api.ication/json]
